long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solana MEME Patrol is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help you monitor Solana wallets. It sends real-time notifications to your Telegram when new tokens are added to any of the wallets you track.
